entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Blue River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:46 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blue River Airport 06:51 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
